text:
Myth: I've already had #COVID19, I don't need the #vaccine.

Fact: Due to the severe health risks associated with COVID-19 and the fact that re-infection with COVID-19 is possible, people who previously had it may be advised to get a COVID-19 vaccine.

https://t.co/myei1W01b5 https://t.co/bTl3Ikjn6N
